S.FORM: Canada hya' ga cyux maki' tay 60 00 N, 95 00 W na pemeco syuw. kwara' kinghciyan niya' 9,984,670 sq km (maki' tay 2ginkgan kin wahci') (kinwhci' niya' ga 9,093,507 sq km , kinwhci' na lawsayan wsilung hya' ga 891,163 sq km) Kinkhmayan kwara' squliq hya' ga 35,362,905. Pinbcyan naha' sni' naha' rhzyal hya' iy pqmahun hya' ga 6.80% , lhlahuy hya' ga 34.10%, sni' naha' sa pptzyuwaw sa bzinah hya' ga 59.10% spzyang qalang na Kokka' spzyang naha' krahu' qalang hya' ga Ottawa. snyan kinramat inlungan na Kokka' snyan kinramat inlungan na Kokka' hya' ga 1 na tay mpitu' byacing na qutux kawas. mrhuw Kokka' mrhuw Kokka' ta' misuw hya' ga Elizabeth II, aring ryax 6 squ byacing tay 2 sa kawas 1952 lga, musa' spazyang balay ms'rux kya la. lalu kkyalan Canada hya ga minkahun naha kay nqu zik na聖羅倫斯易洛魁語 Kanata一詞,imi nya ga qalang ru ini ga rhyal nqu linhuyan naha maki.Maki squ 1535 kawas,misuw qani ga nyux ki'an nqu 'tayal nqu 魁北克市nyux naha mosa rasun qu qutux kahul Kokka nqu法國pyang musa smehang kkongun na yuwaw雅克·卡蒂亞nyux naha rasun te斯塔達科納,ana yaqu rhyal qasa lga sllwan naha maha Kanata la.babaw nqu 雅克·卡蒂亞qaniy lga si'naha say maha Canada imi nya ga 多納科納(pgleng na即斯塔達科納) nyux klhang nqu rhyal.maki squ 1545 kawas,biru nqu Kokka na歐洲ru biru na rhyal kktan 'osa Kokka ga nyux naha 'ringun qu Kokka na Canada qani maha rhyal qani qu mwah rahyuw squ rhyal qani.qsu balay hga maki 17 seci ki 18 seci,sun na Canada qu 新法蘭西na llyung rhyal 聖羅倫斯.nanu saga nyux naha spgluw squ mopuw cyugal kinlhangan na squliq ki rhyal yuwaw hmtuy squ Kokka na英,Sexu na英國maki squ 1774 kawas pkita kmal squ horit na魁北克,taqu horit qani ga nyux pshgci squ kki'an nqu Canada tehok squ zmal krahu nqu languw maki squ rhyal na mkura kilux qasa,kintwahiq nqu llyang na 俄亥俄.Kwara qu rhyal qni ga maki squ 1783 kawas lga wayal naha pskura 'myuw miq squ giqas na Kokka na Amirika la,ana ga zmal nqu languw krahu nqu rhyal te mkura tltu qasa ga,mucing soni nqu 安大略 Sng ka kwara rhyal nyux qrqan nqu Kokka na英國. babaw na qnolan nqu Kokka 英國squ 法蘭西,Kokka nqu Canada lga m'sazing qu qinsugal la,qsugun maha tekraya Canada ru te kyahu Canada la.maki squ 1841kawas,taqu tekraya Canada ru te kyahu Canada lga msqum lozi ru m'Canada Sng la. maki squ 1867 kawas,Canada Sng ki 新布藍茲維ru新斯科細亞ps'rux squ sinqunan naha mlahang nanak squ Canada.gmluw squ Canada n_gyut mshriq kinlahang nqu Kokka英國,ana naha Sexu ga n_giyut gmluw maki squ biru na tthoki ru pinkyalan naha squ gaga ka skayal naha maha Canada.maki squ 1982 kawas lalu nqu smqqas squ ryax sqasan Kokka na Canada aring sun naha maha,naha nanak gmleng maras squ ryax ru wayal naha zyugum maha ryax na Canada. zuaw nqu kinraral ziraynqu ''tayal skahul squ minkingkyuw naha zyuwaw na kinraral ru pinbcywan naha mqbaq ulah nqu squliq,ana balay cikuy ga pkai qu zik na 24, 500 kawas 育空mkura tltu qasa lga rima maki qu squliq cyux myuwi kya la,squliq myuwi maki squ 安大略 mkura kilux baqun mhyuwaw mita squ zik kung yan7,500 kawas.be'nux rhyal na舊克羅ki藍魚洞穴ga snbil naha zyuwaw minnaki squ zik na Canada spyang binkesan rhyal kni'an nqu squliq.spyang baqun maha syaki nqu tayal ga maki qu rhyal b'syqan naha maki,muhi squ rrhyal,m'ubu' nqu syakay ka pinbcyuan ru wanglu na zyuwaw htgan pila.Kya kruma minnqwas na 'tayal hya ga maki squ cinhkan kinlhang na Kokka 歐洲lga zik na ptehuk squ Canada ga wayal rima mshgah la,misuw qani ga siki spwah squ kilnyuhan naha kingkyuw zyuwaw na sraral musa mita squ kilbaqan naha. maki squ tequtux nazyuwaw kinlhang Kokka na 歐洲qu squliq mnki squ Canada ga,kwara ka linpgan kihmayan nqu squliq ga wayal squ 20 mang tehuk 200 mang.gluw nqu mrhuw na Canada ka skahun squ lihoyan na sqblaq hi nqu 'tayal mita,misuw qani ga kya wayal squ 50 mang squliq minnaki rhyal nqu Canada qani.Yalaw gi ungat qu sintnaqan na squ blq ramu nya,taqu 'tayal sqani ga wahan qmyu m'atu nqu kinlhangan na squliq,bgasiq,'nbu kbakih lamu na 'nbu qmyu,wal si pskongat qu squliq nya 40% tehuk squ80%.misuw 'tayal nyux maki squ Canada qani ga tequtux nqu minruk,因努伊特人ki梅蒂人,zik qani ga 'tayal nqu梅蒂hya ga 'tayal ki kinbahan Kokka na 法 wayal 'mimaw ki Canada ru m' kinbahan na Canada la .pspngun ki binah na 'tayal ga,yalaw gi ini pyang psaywah qu squliq na努伊特ki squliq na kinlhangan Kokka na歐洲. sinnhyan horitgaga nqu Canada hya ga maki inu klhang naha zqu Zizyuw na smnhyan,ksxun naha qu lmau na gaga ru klahang qu ana ini ptnaq na sinnhyan ga Zizyuw naha. kahun squ knita naha te 2011kawas hmkangi baq squ ssquliq,Kokka na Canada ga maki 67.3% qu ssquliq smnhi squ Kiristokyo(lpgun uzi qu giqas na Kyokay,Tinskyo)maki squ smnhi Kiristokyo qani ga Tinskyo qu spyang krahu na ubuy nqu smnhi,taqu squliq smnhi squ Tinskyo ga kya waayl tehuk squ 38.7%.sinqunan linhoyan kwara nqu Kyokay Canada ga(maha ni mopuw ga mpitu qu cyoro kyokay na Canada ki binah na kyokay yannqu 衛理公會na Canada,公理會na Canada pinsqunan nqu kyokay .)maki squ rhyal qani ga spyang krahu ubuy nqu giqas kyokay,kinhmayan nqu ssquliq nya ga wal squ 6.1%,ru babaw nya lga kyokay nqu聖公Canada lga (5.0%)ki kyo kay na浸信(1.9%).ru maki qu kya wal squ 23.9％ nqu ssquliq ga ini snhi squ sinnhyan.binha na sinnhyan hya ga 伊斯蘭教(3.2%),印度教(1.7%),錫克教(1.4%),佛教(1.3%)ki猶太教(1.2%),kwara ka smnhi na ssquliq ga wal mtbuci squpin cikay. ppsbaq ppsbaq nqu Canada hya ga kahul naha squ qutux qutux na rrhyal tbuci mtyuwaw lmahang.5 kawas tehuk 7 kawas ru 16 kawas tehuk squ 18kawas qani hya ga qinhlan nqu Kokka na Canada siki mqwas squ biru kwara,ini khzi taqu baq mita squ bnrwan na ssquliq hya ga wayal squ 99％. mucing squ 2011 kawas,maki te 25kawas tehuk squ 64 kawas nqu mebnkis hayhazi hya ga kyawayal squ 88%nqu ssquliq wayal magal squ pinwasan na kawcung pinqbaq biru,pspngu squ sinqunan mtyuwaw ggwahan squ pila ki piaqunan lihuyan squ pphtuw nqu kinbaqan ga (74%)kinwagiq.2002 kawas,maki squ 25kawas tehuk squ 64 kawas na ssquliq Canada ga kya wayal squ 43% nqu ssquliq ga wayal magal squ krahu na pinqwasan biru,ana ga mki squ 25kawas tehuk squ 34 kawas na ssquliq hya ga kyawal squ 51% na ssquliq ga maki kwara qu biru pinwasan naha squ krahu na pinqwasan la. skahul naha squ Kokka kungsi pkayal te razyuw mita maha maki squ bnrwan naha te 2012 kawas,maki squ babaw cinbwanan qani ga spyang krahu qu ppsbaq ru pinwasan na Kokka Canada hya.pinhtgan Knita naha squ cipuqing Kwara ka Kokka na mqwas biru ga mqwas biru nqu Canada hya ga maki qu kinbaqan naha hminas kinwagiq nqu sinqunan mtyuwaw squ hhtgan na pila qu kinbaqan naha,hminas spyang mki squ llpgal,smsun kinmhgan zezyaw qinbaqan na,pbku llamu qinbaqan qinnxan ru kahul squ kinnita naha bbiru musa smbuci kbalay squ haylaw baqun mita nqu mqbaq na squliq. kbalay squ biru na gaga spyang kin binkgan:gagan qu Canada ru ryax krahu na Canada kinbalay naqu湯姆 'rtung abaw na qparung mkura tltu,cyux skun squ kki'an 美術Kokka na Canada, nyux ki'an cingay balay nqu minruk Kokka na Canada qani,cingay qu minruk nya ru ana naha gaga uzi lga wayal mhhuluy cikay ru cingay qu lllamu nqu gaga naha uzi,taqu lllamu nqu gaga naha qani ga nyux klmang nqu horit.maki squ qalang na 魁北克,taqu squliq na魁北克qani ga krahu balay qu kinta naha squ lalu naha nanak,ru gaga nqu魁北克ki Kokka nqu英式na gaga Canada ga maki balay qu ini btnaq.kahul squ kara nqu Kokka mwah mita ga,m'gaga nqu 馬賽克qu Canada qani——yalaw gi gaga nqu Canada qani ga minkahul squ ini ptnaq nqu rrhyal,ru sinqunan nqu squliq na tayal ka ini ptnaq nqu gaga ssquliq.taqu gaga nqu Sexu mosa glgan hya ga,yan nqu sinqunan ppkita squ ''nbu,laxan qu gaga horit maha phuqil hya,kinrrngu puyut squ mqzinut,smrrhuw qmhut lmahang squ ppatus ki ptgyah smwal squ kneril ki kneril mlikuy ki mlikuy ga nway msqum ru qutux nqu mwah kbalay squ inkyasan na gaga Canada. minnaki squ yuwaw kinraral kinlhang nqu rhyal na Kokka 英ki Kokka 法,wayal msbah cikay qu gaga na Canada gi 'mimaw cikay squ rusa Kokka ki gaga nqu 'tayal sqani.taqu kay nqu 'tayal sqani,taqu kinbaqan ka gaga qqyqnux ni tayal ru hngiyang lubuwn qani ga hmluy squ kinnita naha nanak squ lalu naha ka Canada.cingay squliq nqu Canada ga kinmopuw naha krahu mita squ llamu na gaga,knita naha squ llamu na gaga qani ga krangi naha qutux qbci nqu Kokka mita.zyuwaw nqu gnogan na Kokka Amirika ru sinbung ka maki squ yal Kokka na英maki squ zik na gaga Canada ga soyal naha balay,ana ga trang naha soyal uzi qu gaga nqu qeqaya Canada ki spyang maki squ kktan ta squ teribiy ru ega maki squ Amirika ki babaw cinbwanan ana inu nqu rrhyal ga soyal naha balay.ana yaqu gaga nqu kinlhangan ga soyal na Sexu na,horit ki pkayal squ kosiy na Canada,syun naha inlungan qu ega kyuk nqu Kokka na Canada ru razyuw pkayal squ yuwaw na teribi ru yal nqu kkyal nqu linhoyan wi'ing ka kwara ki'an i ppcywagu. skahul naha squ kinbaqan ka gaga qqyqnux ni tayal Canada kinitanaha squ kinbaqan ka gaga qqyqnux musa magal squ sekow spyang karahu,mi'a su nqu 湯姆·湯姆遜——hya ga maki squ kwara babaw cinbwanan ga qutux nqu maki lalu qu minzka nya,ru matas squ linhuyan na pitu squliq.Pinnatas nqu 湯姆遜Canada ka pintasan nya squ ryax ki qsya hminas squ mopuw kawas qu pintasan qnxan,tehuk squ kawas maki te 1917masa tmalam.taqu sinqtuxan naha mita squ linhuyan nqu mpitu ppatas hya lga maki squ 'osa na babaw nqu inlungan ru kwara ka inllungan nqu ssquliq,linhuyan qani ga maki squ 1920 kawas 5 byacing min qutux phtuw squ pinkita naha.taring squ 1950kawas qani ga,galun ni Sexu na Canada qu kilnalay kaku kinbaqan ka gaga qqyqnux ni squliq nqu 因努伊特 sbiq nya squ kahul binah na lpyuwng. cinkhulan sa knita' sa brbiru' CIA 外交部

Canada hya' ga cyox maki' tay 60 00 N, 95 00 W na pemeco syow. kwara' kinghciyan niya' 9,984,670 sq km (maki' tay 2ginkgan kin wahci') (kinwhci' niya' ga 9,093,507 sq km , kinwhci' na lawsayan wsilong hya' ga 891,163 sq km) Kinkhmayan kwara' sqoliq hya' ga 35,362,905. Pinbcyan naha' sni' naha' rhzyal hya' iy pqmahon hya' ga 6.80% , lhlahoy hya' ga 34.10%, sni' naha' sa pptzyowaw sa bzinah hya' ga 59.10% spzyang qalang na Kokka' spzyang naha' kraho' qalang hya' ga Ottawa. snyan kinramat inlongan na Kokka' snyan kinramat inlongan na Kokka' hya' ga 1 na tay mpito' byacing na qotox kawas. mrhow Kokka' mrhow Kokka' ta' misow hya' ga Elizabeth II, aring ryax 6 sqo byacing tay 2 sa kawas 1952 lga, mosa' spazyang balay ms'rox kya la. lalo kkyalan Canada hya ga minkahon naha kay nqo zik na聖羅倫斯易洛魁語 Kanata一詞,imi nya ga qalang ro ini ga rhyal nqo linhoyan naha maki.Maki sqo 1535 kawas,misow qani ga nyox ki'an nqo 'tayal nqo 魁北克市nyox naha mosa rason qo qotox kahol Kokka nqo法國pyang mosa smehang kkongon na yowaw雅克·卡蒂亞nyox naha rason te斯塔達科納,ana yaqo rhyal qasa lga sllwan naha maha Kanata la.babaw nqo 雅克·卡蒂亞qaniy lga si'naha say maha Canada imi nya ga 多納科納(pgleng na即斯塔達科納) nyox klhang nqo rhyal.maki sqo 1545 kawas,biro nqo Kokka na歐洲ro biro na rhyal kktan 'osa Kokka ga nyox naha 'ringon qo Kokka na Canada qani maha rhyal qani qo mwah rahyow sqo rhyal qani.qso balay hga maki 17 seci ki 18 seci,son na Canada qo 新法蘭西na llyong rhyal 聖羅倫斯.nano saga nyox naha spglow sqo mopow cyogal kinlhangan na sqoliq ki rhyal yowaw hmtoy sqo Kokka na英,Sexo na英國maki sqo 1774 kawas pkita kmal sqo horit na魁北克,taqo horit qani ga nyox pshgci sqo kki'an nqo Canada tehok sqo zmal kraho nqo langow maki sqo rhyal na mkora kilox qasa,kintwahiq nqo llyang na 俄亥俄.Kwara qo rhyal qni ga maki sqo 1783 kawas lga wayal naha pskora 'myow miq sqo giqas na Kokka na Amirika la,ana ga zmal nqo langow kraho nqo rhyal te mkora tlto qasa ga,mocing soni nqo 安大略 Sng ka kwara rhyal nyox qrqan nqo Kokka na英國. babaw na qnolan nqo Kokka 英國sqo 法蘭西,Kokka nqo Canada lga m'sazing qo qinsogal la,qsogon maha tekraya Canada ro te kyaho Canada la.maki sqo 1841kawas,taqo tekraya Canada ro te kyaho Canada lga msqom lozi ro m'Canada Sng la. maki sqo 1867 kawas,Canada Sng ki 新布藍茲維ro新斯科細亞ps'rox sqo sinqonan naha mlahang nanak sqo Canada.gmlow sqo Canada n_gyot mshriq kinlahang nqo Kokka英國,ana naha Sexo ga n_giyot gmlow maki sqo biro na tthoki ro pinkyalan naha sqo gaga ka skayal naha maha Canada.maki sqo 1982 kawas lalo nqo smqqas sqo ryax sqasan Kokka na Canada aring son naha maha,naha nanak gmleng maras sqo ryax ro wayal naha zyogom maha ryax na Canada. zoaw nqo kinraral ziraynqo ''tayal skahol sqo minkingkyow naha zyowaw na kinraral ro pinbcywan naha mqbaq olah nqo sqoliq,ana balay cikoy ga pkai qo zik na 24, 500 kawas 育空mkora tlto qasa lga rima maki qo sqoliq cyox myowi kya la,sqoliq myowi maki sqo 安大略 mkora kilox baqon mhyowaw mita sqo zik kong yan7,500 kawas.be'nox rhyal na舊克羅ki藍魚洞穴ga snbil naha zyowaw minnaki sqo zik na Canada spyang binkesan rhyal kni'an nqo sqoliq.spyang baqon maha syaki nqo tayal ga maki qo rhyal b'syqan naha maki,mohi sqo rrhyal,m'obo' nqo syakay ka pinbcyoan ro wanglo na zyowaw htgan pila.Kya kroma minnqwas na 'tayal hya ga maki sqo cinhkan kinlhang na Kokka 歐洲lga zik na ptehok sqo Canada ga wayal rima mshgah la,misow qani ga siki spwah sqo kilnyohan naha kingkyow zyowaw na sraral mosa mita sqo kilbaqan naha. maki sqo teqotox nazyowaw kinlhang Kokka na 歐洲qo sqoliq mnki sqo Canada ga,kwara ka linpgan kihmayan nqo sqoliq ga wayal sqo 20 mang tehok 200 mang.glow nqo mrhow na Canada ka skahon sqo lihoyan na sqblaq hi nqo 'tayal mita,misow qani ga kya wayal sqo 50 mang sqoliq minnaki rhyal nqo Canada qani.Yalaw gi ongat qo sintnaqan na sqo blq ramo nya,taqo 'tayal sqani ga wahan qmyo m'ato nqo kinlhangan na sqoliq,bgasiq,'nbo kbakih lamo na 'nbo qmyo,wal si pskongat qo sqoliq nya 40% tehok sqo80%.misow 'tayal nyox maki sqo Canada qani ga teqotox nqo minrok,因努伊特人ki梅蒂人,zik qani ga 'tayal nqo梅蒂hya ga 'tayal ki kinbahan Kokka na 法 wayal 'mimaw ki Canada ro m' kinbahan na Canada la .pspngon ki binah na 'tayal ga,yalaw gi ini pyang psaywah qo sqoliq na努伊特ki sqoliq na kinlhangan Kokka na歐洲. sinnhyan horitgaga nqo Canada hya ga maki ino klhang naha zqo Zizyow na smnhyan,ksxon naha qo lmao na gaga ro klahang qo ana ini ptnaq na sinnhyan ga Zizyow naha. kahon sqo knita naha te 2011kawas hmkangi baq sqo ssqoliq,Kokka na Canada ga maki 67.3% qo ssqoliq smnhi sqo Kiristokyo(lpgon ozi qo giqas na Kyokay,Tinskyo)maki sqo smnhi Kiristokyo qani ga Tinskyo qo spyang kraho na oboy nqo smnhi,taqo sqoliq smnhi sqo Tinskyo ga kya waayl tehok sqo 38.7%.sinqonan linhoyan kwara nqo Kyokay Canada ga(maha ni mopow ga mpito qo cyoro kyokay na Canada ki binah na kyokay yannqo 衛理公會na Canada,公理會na Canada pinsqonan nqo kyokay .)maki sqo rhyal qani ga spyang kraho oboy nqo giqas kyokay,kinhmayan nqo ssqoliq nya ga wal sqo 6.1%,ro babaw nya lga kyokay nqo聖公Canada lga (5.0%)ki kyo kay na浸信(1.9%).ro maki qo kya wal sqo 23.9％ nqo ssqoliq ga ini snhi sqo sinnhyan.binha na sinnhyan hya ga 伊斯蘭教(3.2%),印度教(1.7%),錫克教(1.4%),佛教(1.3%)ki猶太教(1.2%),kwara ka smnhi na ssqoliq ga wal mtboci sqopin cikay. ppsbaq ppsbaq nqo Canada hya ga kahol naha sqo qotox qotox na rrhyal tboci mtyowaw lmahang.5 kawas tehok 7 kawas ro 16 kawas tehok sqo 18kawas qani hya ga qinhlan nqo Kokka na Canada siki mqwas sqo biro kwara,ini khzi taqo baq mita sqo bnrwan na ssqoliq hya ga wayal sqo 99％. mocing sqo 2011 kawas,maki te 25kawas tehok sqo 64 kawas nqo mebnkis hayhazi hya ga kyawayal sqo 88%nqo ssqoliq wayal magal sqo pinwasan na kawcong pinqbaq biro,pspngo sqo sinqonan mtyowaw ggwahan sqo pila ki piaqonan lihoyan sqo pphtow nqo kinbaqan ga (74%)kinwagiq.2002 kawas,maki sqo 25kawas tehok sqo 64 kawas na ssqoliq Canada ga kya wayal sqo 43% nqo ssqoliq ga wayal magal sqo kraho na pinqwasan biro,ana ga mki sqo 25kawas tehok sqo 34 kawas na ssqoliq hya ga kyawal sqo 51% na ssqoliq ga maki kwara qo biro pinwasan naha sqo kraho na pinqwasan la. skahol naha sqo Kokka kongsi pkayal te razyow mita maha maki sqo bnrwan naha te 2012 kawas,maki sqo babaw cinbwanan qani ga spyang kraho qo ppsbaq ro pinwasan na Kokka Canada hya.pinhtgan Knita naha sqo cipoqing Kwara ka Kokka na mqwas biro ga mqwas biro nqo Canada hya ga maki qo kinbaqan naha hminas kinwagiq nqo sinqonan mtyowaw sqo hhtgan na pila qo kinbaqan naha,hminas spyang mki sqo llpgal,smson kinmhgan zezyaw qinbaqan na,pbko llamo qinbaqan qinnxan ro kahol sqo kinnita naha bbiro mosa smboci kbalay sqo haylaw baqon mita nqo mqbaq na sqoliq. kbalay sqo biro na gaga spyang kin binkgan:gagan qo Canada ro ryax kraho na Canada kinbalay naqo湯姆 'rtong abaw na qparong mkora tlto,cyox skon sqo kki'an 美術Kokka na Canada, nyox ki'an cingay balay nqo minrok Kokka na Canada qani,cingay qo minrok nya ro ana naha gaga ozi lga wayal mhholoy cikay ro cingay qo lllamo nqo gaga naha ozi,taqo lllamo nqo gaga naha qani ga nyox klmang nqo horit.maki sqo qalang na 魁北克,taqo sqoliq na魁北克qani ga kraho balay qo kinta naha sqo lalo naha nanak,ro gaga nqo魁北克ki Kokka nqo英式na gaga Canada ga maki balay qo ini btnaq.kahol sqo kara nqo Kokka mwah mita ga,m'gaga nqo 馬賽克qo Canada qani——yalaw gi gaga nqo Canada qani ga minkahol sqo ini ptnaq nqo rrhyal,ro sinqonan nqo sqoliq na tayal ka ini ptnaq nqo gaga ssqoliq.taqo gaga nqo Sexo mosa glgan hya ga,yan nqo sinqonan ppkita sqo ''nbo,laxan qo gaga horit maha phoqil hya,kinrrngo poyot sqo mqzinot,smrrhow qmhot lmahang sqo ppatos ki ptgyah smwal sqo kneril ki kneril mlikoy ki mlikoy ga nway msqom ro qotox nqo mwah kbalay sqo inkyasan na gaga Canada. minnaki sqo yowaw kinraral kinlhang nqo rhyal na Kokka 英ki Kokka 法,wayal msbah cikay qo gaga na Canada gi 'mimaw cikay sqo rosa Kokka ki gaga nqo 'tayal sqani.taqo kay nqo 'tayal sqani,taqo kinbaqan ka gaga qqyqnox ni tayal ro hngiyang lobown qani ga hmloy sqo kinnita naha nanak sqo lalo naha ka Canada.cingay sqoliq nqo Canada ga kinmopow naha kraho mita sqo llamo na gaga,knita naha sqo llamo na gaga qani ga krangi naha qotox qbci nqo Kokka mita.zyowaw nqo gnogan na Kokka Amirika ro sinbong ka maki sqo yal Kokka na英maki sqo zik na gaga Canada ga soyal naha balay,ana ga trang naha soyal ozi qo gaga nqo qeqaya Canada ki spyang maki sqo kktan ta sqo teribiy ro ega maki sqo Amirika ki babaw cinbwanan ana ino nqo rrhyal ga soyal naha balay.ana yaqo gaga nqo kinlhangan ga soyal na Sexo na,horit ki pkayal sqo kosiy na Canada,syon naha inlongan qo ega kyok nqo Kokka na Canada ro razyow pkayal sqo yowaw na teribi ro yal nqo kkyal nqo linhoyan wi'ing ka kwara ki'an i ppcywago. skahol naha sqo kinbaqan ka gaga qqyqnox ni tayal Canada kinitanaha sqo kinbaqan ka gaga qqyqnox mosa magal sqo sekow spyang karaho,mi'a so nqo 湯姆·湯姆遜——hya ga maki sqo kwara babaw cinbwanan ga qotox nqo maki lalo qo minzka nya,ro matas sqo linhoyan na pito sqoliq.Pinnatas nqo 湯姆遜Canada ka pintasan nya sqo ryax ki qsya hminas sqo mopow kawas qo pintasan qnxan,tehok sqo kawas maki te 1917masa tmalam.taqo sinqtoxan naha mita sqo linhoyan nqo mpito ppatas hya lga maki sqo 'osa na babaw nqo inlongan ro kwara ka inllongan nqo ssqoliq,linhoyan qani ga maki sqo 1920 kawas 5 byacing min qotox phtow sqo pinkita naha.taring sqo 1950kawas qani ga,galon ni Sexo na Canada qo kilnalay kako kinbaqan ka gaga qqyqnox ni sqoliq nqo 因努伊特 sbiq nya sqo kahol binah na lpyowng.
